pt: Cores serão 40% mais escuras enquanto o foco estiver na janela

en: Only one file should be dropped
pt: Apenas um arquivo deve ser solto

en:
[font_size=32][center]Network[/center][/font_size]
The classic (and good) [i][url=https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Internet_protocol_suite]TCP/IP[/url][/i] Connection.
Where one person it's the server and everybody can connect using the server IP & port.
[center][img]res://windows/window_servers/network_settings/p2p.svg[/img][/center]
After a client connect to the server, they can notify the server and others clients about status changes.

[font_size=32][center]Clients[/center][/font_size]
Just put the server IP & port... Internet will take you to the server.

[font_size=32][center]Server[/center][/font_size]
You have work to do... Make sure that your modem will not ignore your friends requests.
[center][img]res://windows/window_servers/network_settings/modem.svg[/img][/center]

[i]> How do I know my public IP?[/i]
You can search on google "my IP" and many websites will tell you two IPs (IPv4 and IPv6), my recommendation is using IPv6.
This IP let your friends find your modem.

[i]> How do I know my private IP?[/i]
if you are on Windows, you can... I don't remember now.
If you are on Linux, you can put on terminal [code]ip address[/code].
This IP let your modem find your computer.

[i]> How do I know my port?[/i]
Choose any number between 1023 and 65.535
It will give an error the port it's already in use, but if it's not.... them you can use it.

[i]> How do I setup my modem?[/i]
Errr... Each modem is different and I can't give you a guide for each modem but here is my:
- Access [url=http://192.168.0.1/]http://192.168.0.1/[/url]
- My login and password was under the modem
- Go to advanced configurations
- Go to advanced
- Go to port forwarding
- Add a new port forwarding
	- Protocol: TCP/UDP
	- Server IP Address: Your private IP
	- External/Internal Port Start/End: Your port
 
Tell your friends your public IP and the port that you chose.
Now the modem should redirect their request to your computer.
[center][img]res://windows/window_servers/network_settings/modem2.svg[/img][/center]

[font_size=32][center]Warning[/center][/font_size]
Nowadays, there is cases where your IP it’s not open to the world because your internet provider may be putting you behind [i][url=https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Network_address_translation]NAT[/url][/i], in this cases there is not much to do other than using services like [url=https://www.zerotier.com/]ZeroTier[/url].
Double click to show user interface again
pt: Clique duas vezes para exibir a interface

en:
[p align=center]On the left you can find options which you can connect to your friends[/p]
[p align=center]Selecting one will explain how it works[/p]
